# Slime (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Ghaunadaur |

**Granted Powers:** Rebuke or command oozes as an evil cleric rebukes or commands undead. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Cha modifier.

**Slime Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Grease (Spell)|Grease]]****:** Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.

**2** **[[Acid Arrow (Spell)|Acid Arrow]]****:** Ranged touch attack; 2d4 damage for 1 round + 1 round/3 levels.

**3 Poison:** Touch deals 1d10 Con damage, repeats in 1 minute.

**4** **[[Rusting Grasp (Spell)|Rusting Grasp]]****:** Your touch corrodes iron and alloys.

**5** **[[Black Tentacles (Spell)|Black Tentacles]]****:** Tentacles grapple all within 15-ft. spread.

**6** **[[Transmute Rock to Mud (Spell)|Transmute Rock to Mud]]****:** Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

**7** **[[Destruction (Spell)|Destruction]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Kills subject and destroys remains.

**8** **[[Power Word Blind (Spell)|Power Word Blind]]****:** Blinds creature with 200 hp or less.

**9** **[[Implosion (Spell)|Implosion]]****:** Kills one creature/round.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 280 |
|---|---|
| | Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC), pg. 91 |
